import {Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {IProfile} from "../interfaces/cv-interfaces"; @Component({ selector: 'app-profile-view', templateUrl: './profile-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./profile-view.component.css'] }) export class ProfileViewComponent { @Input() public profileData: IProfile }
